title.en: Reiwa ni Kannou Shousetsu Tsukuttemasu - France Shoin Henshuubu Monogatari

altTitles.ja: 令和に官能小説作ってます
令和に官能小説作ってます　フランス書院編集部物語

altTitles.ja-ro: Reiwa ni Kannou Shousetsu Tsukuttemasu - France Shoin Henshuubu Monogatari

altTitles.en: Creating Erotic Novels in the Reiwa Era: The France Shoin Editorial Department’s Story

description.en:
France Shoin paperbacks — recognized by its signature black cover — was first published in 1985 and has since published over 2,600 books.

In these times where erotic content comes in various formats like videos, manga and audio (ASMR), all of which are widely available on the Internet, this group competes with just printed erotic novels.
Mashiro Oizumi, a newly hired female editor, gets to work in this veiled corner of the publishing world; but what awaits her there is a world of things that go beyond her imagination!

The France Shoin Editorial Department's story is now available!

(Source: France Shoin)
description.ja: 動画、コミック、ASMR（音声）……エロコンテンツがネットにあふれる時代に、あえて「活字」だけで勝負する官能小説。黒い表紙で知られるフランス書院文庫は1985年に創刊され、既刊は2,600冊を超える。新人の女性編集者・大泉ましろは、ヴェールに包まれた出版界の秘境で働くことになるが、そこに待っていたのは想像を越えた世界だった――ネットで大きな話題を呼んだ「フランス書院編集部物語」が、１話～５話（完結）の合本版で登場！

biography.en: **Native name**: フランス書院編集部

Not to be confused with [Satou Yuuki (佐藤友生)](https://mangadex.org/author/5ffd5715-3b87-4266-850a-42254bad9203) or [Satou Yuuki (佐藤祐紀)](https://mangadex.org/author/dc21a571-7b70-4927-87be-215aab4216fd).
